title: Introducing: M E T R Y K
body:
This is stunning.

Berlin trio **M E T R Y K** comprised of Hanna, Falk and Arne have just released their debut, three track EP, composed of nine minutes of otherworldly electronic-pop. From Hanna’s untouchable vocals, to the beautiful, swirling compositions that cascade around her, there’s something magical to their EP, _Calming Waves_. It’s a sound that’s been done before, but rarely done so well. Check out the full release below, you won’t regret it.
